document.docAuthor: Anagha, S., Kumar, P. Girish, Binoy, C., Mazumdar, P. C. & Sureshan, P. M.
document.masterDocTitle: A review of the mud-dauber wasps of genus Sceliphron Klug (Hymenoptera Sphecidae) from India

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Sphex madraspatanus Fabricius, 1781: 445
, sex not indicated (as madraspatana , incorrect original gender). Lectotype : ♂ , India :

subSubSection.paragraph: Kerala : former Malabar District (BMNH, coll. Banks), designated by van der Vecht 1961: 43 (use of the word “ type ”). Pulawski (2021) gives a list of the synonymy, which is not repeated here.
